2000.title: Ariel Sharon visits the Temple Mount
2000.description: Against Palestinian warnings, Ariel Sharon visits the Temple Mount surrounded by a large police escort. Riots would follow, more than two dozen will be injured in the immediate aftermath. This event would trigger the Second Intifada.

2001.title: One full year of the Intifada
2001.description: 534-737 Palestinians and 117-179 Israelis have been killed; 10,596-29,000 Palestinians and 1,800-1,878 Israelis have been injured. At least 328 houses have been demolished; 25,000 trees uprooted; and more than 2000 hectares bulldozed.

2002.title: A wall is approved
2002.description: The Israeli cabinet approves construction of a series of fences, sensors, ditches, and barriers. The Israeli army begins by constructing a 7-km fence near Tulkarm. 800 hectares of Palestinian land is confiscated.
